p: Formulation is X Al(SO 4) 212H 2O, where X is a monovalent cation such as potassium or ammonium. Alum or phitkari is a transparent salt-like substance that is used in cooking as well as for medicinal purposes. In Ayurveda, alum (phitkari) is used in the form of Bhasma (Pure Ash) called Sphatika Bhasma.
